tool_description: Extract geolocation data from a given IP
name: APIC IP
title: APIC IP

api_list.name: Geolocation API
api_list.description: Simple to use API that helps you extract geo location fields like city, postal, region, country and continent from a given IP
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apic-ip.p.rapidapi.com/223.190.81.15"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apic-ip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://apic-ip.p.rapidapi.com/{ip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apic-ip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
